OCD.name: FM - Update Create Date Process
OCD.description: Try to ensure the correct Create Date metadata is visible for every asset.

AD.name: Target Property
AD.description: Asset metadata property to contain the created date.

AD.name: MIME Mappings
AD.description: Define mappings from a MIME type (dc:format) to a metadata property containing its created date. (i.e. - application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document=dam:created)
